title: Ather Energy to sign long-term battery supply contract with Amara Raja
description: Ather Energy, based in Bengaluru and focused on electric two-wheelers, is nearing a deal with Amara Raja Energy & Mobility for a battery supply agreement tailored to the Indian market. This partnership aims to cut import reliance and manage supply and price fluctuations. A formal announcement is expected soon, with battery deliveries projected to start within 12 to 18 months.
